title.rendered: Industrial Absorbent Market is expected to reach US$ 6.5 billion by 2034, advancing at a CAGR of 3.7%

content.rendered:
The future of the global industrial absorbent market looks promising with opportunities in the material & chemical, food & beverage, automotive, aerospace & defense, oil & gas, and healthcare sectors. North America will lead the global industrial absorbents market during the forecast period

NEWARK, Del, Feb. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — The industrial absorbent market is estimated to be worth US$ 4.5 billion in 2024 and is projected to be valued at US$ 6.5 billion in 2034. Between 2024 and 2034, the industry is expected to register a CAGR of 3.7%. The expanding scope of industries, including manufacturing, oil and gas, chemicals, automotive, and healthcare, is driving the demand for industrial absorbents.

These sectors require effective spill management solutions to address spills, leaks, and drips occurring during various stages such as production, transportation, and storage. This increasing demand is propelling the growth of the industrial absorbents market.

Rising environmental concerns and a growing imperative for businesses to monitor their environmental impact are expected to drive the global industrial absorbents industry forward in the coming years. The demand for eco-friendly, high-performance absorbent materials is anticipated to fuel innovation and shape the future of spill management solutions across various sectors worldwide.

Gain Valuable Insights from Industry Experts to Shape Your Growth Strategies. Access our Sample Report Now: https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-18995

The global surge in oil and gas consumption has necessitated a significant increase in production to meet demand, raising the likelihood of oil spills during extraction activities. To safeguard both individuals and the environment from these risks, industrial absorbents are extensively utilized. There has been a notable uptick in the demand for industrial absorbents.

The projected rise in the adoption of industrial absorbents within the oil and gas sector presents manufacturers with a prime opportunity to innovate and create absorbent materials that offer both effectiveness and affordability. The exploration of new crude oil and natural gas reservoirs further amplifies the business prospects for industrial absorbent manufacturers worldwide.

Key Takeaways from the Industry Study

  • From 2019 to 2023, the industrial absorbent market expanded at a CAGR of 5.7%.
  • Based on the type, the organic segment is expected to rise at a CAGR of 3.5% from 2024 to 2034.
  • The industrial absorbent demand in China is predicted to grow at a CAGR of 4.0% through 2034.
  • In the United States, the industrial absorbent industry is estimated to register a CAGR of 3.9% from 2024 to 2034.
  • The United Kingdom is projected to expand by a value CAGR of 4.6% between 2024 and 2034.
  • The industrial absorbent market in Japan is anticipated to record a CAGR of 4.4% during 2034.

“The stringent environmental regulations, which mandate the use of effective spill control measures and growing emphasis on workplace safety propelling the growth of the industrial absorbent market,” says Nikhil Kaitwade (Associate Vice President at Future Market Insights, Inc.) 

Enhance Your Business Now! Acquire Vital Market Insights – Access the Report Now: https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/checkout/18995

Competitive Landscape

Key players in the global industrial absorbent market are strategically prioritizing collaboration, expansion, and the introduction of innovative products. The market players expanding market presence by entering new geographical regions or strengthening existing footholds through acquisitions, mergers, or partnerships.

  • In January 2023, ANSELL Ltd. unveiled a partnership with Vizient, Inc., focusing on room turnover essentials. Under this collaboration, Vizient members gain access to discounted rates on an extensive array of room turnover items, including absorbent floor pads, disposable linens, mops, waste bags, patient positioning straps, and turnover packs.
  • Decorus Europe offers a range of industrial absorbent products, including pads, socks, and pillows, designed to meet the spill containment and cleanup needs of various industries.
  • Meltblown Technologies Inc. produces absorbent materials using advanced manufacturing processes, offering efficient solutions for spill response and environmental protection.

Key Players in the Industrial Absorbent Market

  • Kimberly-Clark Worldwide Inc.
  • 3M
  • Johnson Matthey
  • ANSELL LTD
  • Brady Worldwide Inc.
  • Monarch Green Inc.
  • Decorus Europe
  • Meltblown Technologies Inc.
  • TOLSA
  • UES Promura

Request a Methodology: https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/request-report-methodology/rep-gb-18995

Industrial Absorbent Market – Key Segments

By Type:

  • Organic
  • Inorganic
  • Synthetic

By Material:

  • Clay
  • Diatomaceous Earth
  • Cellulose
  • Polypropylene
  • Others

By Region:

  • North America
  • Latin America
  • Western Europe
  • Eastern Europe
  • South Asia and Pacific
  • East Asia
  • Middle East and Africa

Author

Nikhil Kaitwade (Associate Vice President at Future Market Insights, Inc.) has over a decade of experience in market research and business consulting. He has successfully delivered 1500+ client assignments, predominantly in Automotive, Chemicals, Industrial Equipment, Oil & Gas, and Service industries.

His core competency circles around developing research methodology, creating a unique analysis framework, statistical data models for pricing analysis, competition mapping, and market feasibility analysis. His expertise also extends wide and beyond analysis, advising clients on identifying growth potential in established and niche market segments, investment/divestment decisions, and market entry decision-making.

Nikhil holds an MBA degree in Marketing and IT and a Graduate in Mechanical Engineering. Nikhil has authored several publications and quoted in journals like EMS Now, EPR Magazine, and EE Times.

Explore FMI’s Extensive Coverage in the Chemical and Materials Domain:

Newly released rodent control pesticides market analysis report by Future Market Insights shows that global sales of the market in 2032 was held at US$ 11.6 Billion.

It is anticipated that the esters market would be valued at US$ 94.19 billion. Esters are expected to see a 5.4% compound annual growth rate and a US$ 159.36 billion market by 2033.

Over the course of the forecast period, the castor oil derivatives market is anticipated to grow at a CAGR of 4.9% on average. By 2033, it is projected that the market would have crossed US$ 2.21 billion in value.

The PEG and PPG esters market is now valued at US$ 4.27 billion in 2022, and it is anticipated to increase at a CAGR of 4% over the course of the forecast period to reach a market value of US$ 6.33 billion by 2032.

The global agricultural lubricant market size reached US$ 484.1 million in 2023. Over the forecast period, global demand is poised to rise at 5.5% CAGR. By 2033, the overall market valuation is set to total US$ 826.7 million.

Global calcium bromide market demand is anticipated to be valued at US$ 5.3 Billion in 2022, forecast to grow at a CAGR of 5.2% to be valued at US$ 8.8 Billion from 2022 to 2032.

From 2023 to 2033, the anhydrous hydrogen fluoride is expected to grow at a 5.8% CAGR, reaching a value of US$ 5.7 Billion by the end of 2033.

During the projection period of 2022 to 2032, the flame retardant chemicals market is predicted to grow at a CAGR of 7.1%, with a valuation of US$ 16,990 Million by 2032.

The chemical testing services market is expected to hold a share of US$ 52.19 billion by 2033, while the market is likely to reach a value of US$ 30.84 billion in 2023.

About Future Market Insights (FMI)

Future Market Insights (FMI) is a leading provider of market intelligence and consulting services, serving clients in over 150 countries. FMI is headquartered in Dubai and has delivery centers in the United Kingdom, the United States, and India. FMI’s latest market research reports and industry analysis helps businesses navigate challenges and make critical decisions with confidence and clarity amidst breakneck competition. Our customized and syndicated market research reports deliver actionable insights that drive sustainable growth. A team of expert-led analysts at FMI continuously tracks emerging trends and events in a broad range of industries to ensure that our clients prepare for the evolving needs of their consumers.
